name: Shield Specialization
baseDescription: Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 1% and has a 20% chance to generate 1 rage when a block occurs.

name: Improved Bloodrage
baseDescription: Increases the instant Rage generated by your Bloodrage ability by 5.

name: Toughness
baseDescription: Increases your armor value from items by 2%.

name: Iron Will
baseDescription: Increases your chance to resist Stun and Charm effects by an additional 3%.

name: Improved Thunder Clap
baseDescription: Reduces the cost of your Thunder Clap ability by 1 rage point.

name: Last Stand
baseDescription: When activated, this ability temporarily grants you 30% of your maximum hit points for 20 seconds.  After the effect expires, the hit points are lost.

name: Improved Shield Block
baseDescription: Hurls an immense fiery boulder that causes 148 to 195 Fire damage and an additional 56 Fire damage over 12 sec.

name: Improved Revenge
baseDescription: Gives your Revenge ability a 15% chance to stun the target for 3 sec.

name: Defiance
baseDescription: Increases the threat generated by your attacks by 3% while in Defensive Stance.

name: Improved Sunder Armor
baseDescription: Reduces the cost of your Sunder Armor ability by 1 rage point.

name: Improved Disarm
baseDescription: Increases the duration of your Disarm ability by 1 secs.

name: Improved Taunt
baseDescription: Reduces the cooldown of your Taunt ability by 1 sec.

name: Improved Shield Wall
baseDescription: Increases the effect duration of your Shield Wall ability by 3 secs.

name: Improved Shield Bash
baseDescription: Gives your Shield Bash ability a 100% chance to silence the target for 3 sec.

name: One-Handed Weapon Specialization
baseDescription: Increases the damage you deal with One-Handed Melee weapons by 2%.

name: Shield Slam
baseDescription: Slam the target with your shield, causing 225 to 235 damage, modified by your shield block value, and has a 50% chance of dispelling 1 magic effect on the target.  Also causes a high amount of threat.
